price: 32. En zeker allen – ieder van hen zal voor Ons gebracht worden.
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
